properties.name: pressure
properties.description: The force exerted by the weight of the water column above the sensor

properties.name: depth
properties.description: The vertical distance below the water surface where measurements are taken

properties.name: samples_per_second
properties.description: The sampling rate, indicating how many samples were taken per second

properties.name: cast_time_utc
properties.description: The time the data collection started in Coordinated Universal Time

properties.name: salinity
properties.description: The concentration of dissolved salts in the water
